items.label: cor-mean-field-lsi
items.title: Mean-Field LSI from N-Uniform Bounds
items.content:
639: :label: cor-mean-field-lsi
640: 
641: The mean-field density $\rho_\infty$ (limit of $\mu_N$ as $N \to \infty$) satisfies:
642: 
643: $$
644: D_{\text{KL}}(\nu \| \rho_\infty) \leq C_{\text{LSI}}^{\text{MF}} \cdot I(\nu \| \rho_\infty)
645: $$
items.raw_directive:
636: ### A1.3.2 Implications for Mean-Field LSI
637: 
638: :::{prf:corollary} Mean-Field LSI from N-Uniform Bounds
639: :label: cor-mean-field-lsi
640: 
641: The mean-field density $\rho_\infty$ (limit of $\mu_N$ as $N \to \infty$) satisfies:
642: 
643: $$
644: D_{\text{KL}}(\nu \| \rho_\infty) \leq C_{\text{LSI}}^{\text{MF}} \cdot I(\nu \| \rho_\infty)
645: $$
646:
